Package piano

Constitues the logic used in the Piano demonstration

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Piano
    This class will implement a way to play piano directly from the launchpad, with proper keys displayed on it and instant audio (either will be samples or will send MIDI to an external MIDI compatible piano synthesizer - Pianoteq 2.2 - for even more close to real piano sound).
    PianoKey
    Implements methods to play a Piano key based on given parameters
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Piano.CONTROLS
    Class enumerating objects that contain X and Y coordinates for all the extra Control buttons to be used in the Piano demo, as well as their color and intensity information

Package piano Description

Constitues the logic used in the Piano demonstration
